query:
SELECT id, title, description, framework, level, JSON_LENGTH(modules) as module_count 
FROM courses 
WHERE framework = 'NIST AI RMF' 
ORDER BY id;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VC7xi4RHX81jG7.65112bc774d1 --database K34VNBtbDJyjtW8qhrCBdB --execute SELECT id, title, description, framework, level, JSON_LENGTH(modules) as module_count 
FROM courses 
WHERE framework = 'NIST AI RMF' 
ORDER BY id;

rows.title: NIST AI RMF Fundamentals
rows.description: Introduction to the four functions: Govern, Map, Measure, Manage, AI risk categories, and trustworthy AI characteristics

rows.title: AI Risk Governance
rows.description: Build organizational AI governance structures, define roles and responsibilities, create AI policies, and engage stakeholders

rows.title: AI Risk Assessment & Measurement
rows.description: Master AI system testing and evaluation, bias detection and mitigation, performance metrics, and continuous monitoring

rows.title: Federal AI Regulations
rows.description: Navigate Executive Order 14110, OMB AI guidance, and sector-specific regulations in healthcare, finance, and defense

rows.title: NIST AI RMF Fundamentals
rows.description: Master the NIST AI Risk Management Framework with comprehensive training on the four core functions (Govern, Map, Measure, Manage) and seven trustworthy AI characteristics. Learn to build trustworthy AI systems through structured risk management. Duration: 20 hours. Prerequisites: Basic understanding of AI/ML concepts (recommended but not required). Target Audience: AI practitioners, compliance officers, risk managers, product managers.
